2083220.name: Alchem It
2083220.description:
Start your new journey as an alchemist! Open your own potion shop and start brewing all kinds of potions for your dear customers. As a new alchemy apprentice, you will learn about plenty of different ingredients and all the brewing techniques needed to make your customers happy. Work hard and earn coins to upgrade and decorate your shop!



Brew potions
Customers will need different remedies depending on their needs, so be ready to brew all kinds of potions and elixirs. Check the scroll and follow the recipe shown in the book to pour the correct ingredients into the cauldron. Once the potion is done, choose the correct bottle size, fill it and deliver it to your customer. If you mess up while making the potion and don't meet the customer's expectations, you'll lose coins, so aim for perfection!



Master your workflow
Harvest the plants from your outdoor garden, take them to the seed extractor to get their pure element, use the mortar to boost the element and pour them to the cauldron. Certain customers may request for additional effects on potion, so be sure to add the special ingredients that will create these desired side effects. Also, you will need to investigate the



Decorate your store
Earn coins for each potion you sell! With your earnings, you will be able to decorate your shop and buy new optional tools to be more efficient and brew even more potions in less time. You will also be able to customize your hands, decorate your shops with all kinds of objects, and more.
2083220.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 法语, 德语, 简体中文, 韩语, 日语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 阿拉伯语, 加泰罗尼亚语
